p:
To understand the underlying biological processes between differentially expressed mRNAs, the gene ontology (GO) database by DAVID (Database for Annotation, Visualization, and Integrated Discovery)
1 was used to perform functional enrichment analysis. Pathway analysis was conducted using the Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG)
2 . The relationships among the enriched clusters from the GO and KEGG pathway analyses were visualized using R ggplot2 package and Cytoscape v3.7.2.
